refnamediv.refpurpose: Extracts a single graph from an RDF dataset

refsection.title: Installation
refsection.para: The cx:rdf-graph step is not included in the standard XML Calabash release. You must obtain it separately and install it on your classpath before you can use this step. (More detailed instructions, T.B.D.)

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: The cx:rdf-graph step extracts a single graph from a dataset. If a graph name is provided, that named graph is extracted. If no name is provided, the default model is extracted.
